Indirizzi IP da analizzare: 

1° Indirizzo IP 128.1.6.5/12  
- IP Address   128.1.6.5        10000000.0000 0001.00000110.00000101 
- Netmask      255.240.0.0= 12  11111111.1111 0000.00000000.00000000
- IP Network   128.0.0.0/12     10000000.0000 0000.00000000.00000000 
- HostMin      128.0.0.1        10000000.0000 0000.00000000.00000001
- HostMax      128.15.255.254   10000000.0000 1111.11111111.11111110
- IP Broadcast 128.15.255.255   10000000.0000 1111.11111111.11111111 
- Host/net     1048574          Class B

- HostMax      200.1.2.254      11001000.00000001.00000010. 11111110
- IP Broadcast 200.1.2.255      11001000.00000001.00000010. 11111111
